title: Lux and Ashe Speedpaints

embed.description: Finally I made my first video. Here you can see me coloring my Star Guardian Lux fanart from League of Legends. Copic markers I used for this piece: E11, E00, E21, Y11, Y13, Y15, YR24, RV13, V09, B60, B14, B32, c1, C3, C5. Pigma Micron 02, 04 and 08.

body:
Hi guys!

I'm starting to post on Youtube some speedpaints of fanarts I made about League of Legends characters, one is a [Star Guardian Lux](https://youtu.be/zj7h-i_vBwY) and the other one is [Tribal Ashe](https://youtu.be/Ghy4nwC8424). I paint most of my paintings with copic markers and watercolors. It would be amazing if you could take a look and tell me if you like and suggest more characters to make in the future.

Sorry if my english isn't very good. Thank you so much for watching.
Bye! :D

replies.body: I love watching speed painting videos, and Lux is one of my favorite champions, which makes this even more exciting! I really like how you did her hair! ^-^

I would be all over a Gnar speedpaint.
More than how much over I am on this.
Hope to see more of these!

It's gorgeous.

I'd love you forever if you drew Braum!

There is never enough Moustache fanart..!

OMG THAT LOOKS SO AMAZING!!! how long did you take to make this?
 Would love to see a {{champion:122}} in your future drawings =)
